LanguageData.BM_PyroprojectorModule_Aura.label: pyroprojector active
LanguageData.BM_PyroprojectorModule_Aura.description: This person's pyroprojector module is projecting a bubble-like barrier that scorches and ignites everything within its range.
LanguageData.BM_SpacerMagprojectorAbilityModule.label: magprojector module
LanguageData.BM_MagprojectorModule_Aura.label: magprojector active
LanguageData.BM_MagprojectorModule_Aura.description: This person's magprojector module is projecting a bubble-like barrier that damages and stuns any nearby electronic equipment, mechanoids or users of certain implants.
LanguageData.BM_SpacerMedprojectorAbilityModule.label: medprojector module
LanguageData.BM_MedprojectorModule_Aura.label: medprojector active
LanguageData.BM_MedprojectorModule_Aura.description: This person's medprojector module is projecting a bubble-like barrier that heals anyone within its range.
LanguageData.BM_SpacerRadprojectorAbilityModule.label: radprojector module
LanguageData.BM_RadprojectorModule_Aura.label: radprojector active
LanguageData.BM_RadprojectorModule_Aura.description: This person's radprojector module is projecting a bubble-like barrier that poisons everything within its range.
LanguageData.BM_CryoprojectorModule_Aura.label: cryoprojector active
LanguageData.BM_CryoprojectorModule_Aura.description: This person's cryoprojector module is projecting a bubble-like barrier that slowly freezes everything within its range.
